#summary Notes on installation of MythDroid

==MythTV Version==

!MythDroid 0.5 supports MythTV 0.21 - 0.24.

==MythTV Configuration==

You must enable the 'Enable frontend network control' option in each frontend's 
general settings. MDD requires additional configuration steps - see 
[MDDInstall the MDD install guide].

If you're running MythTV 0.21 see the [021Specific 0.21 specific notes], if 
you're running MythTV 0.22 see the [022Specific 0.22 specific notes]. If 
you're running any other version, you should be all set.

==Installation==

==== !MythDroid 0.5 ====

Download the latest 
[http://mythdroid.googlecode.com/files/MythDroid-0.5.1.apk MythDroid APK] 
and install using adb (from the Android SDK) or an application from the Market. 
Alternatively check out the latest 0.5 source using subversion URL 
http://mythdroid.googlecode.com/svn/branches/0.5.

==== !MythDroid trunk ====

See [BuildGuide the guide] to building !MythDroid from source.
